name: Don't turn off the lights
description:
*:..｡o○ ○o｡..:*

Click with the mouse to play the game.

Esc to exit.

You become a ghost invisible to her

Surprise her by turning off the lights in her room.

An electric switch is located at the entrance of each room.

There are actions in the room besides the switch.

At first she panics, but she gradually becomes more excited.

*:..｡o○　○o｡..:*

Created during the period:

Game Logic, UI, Character Model.

*:..｡o○　○o｡..:*

Assets outside the jam period：

Rooms
